verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Vindicate<WH8199> me, O Lord,<WH3068> for I have walked<WH1980> in my integrity;<WH8537> And I have trusted<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068> without<WH3808> wavering.<WH4571>
Examine<WH974> me, O Lord,<WH3068> and try<WH5254> me; Test<WH6884> my mind<WH3629> and my heart.<WH3820>
For Thy lovingkindness<WH2617> is before<WH6440> my eyes,<WH5869> And I have walked<WH1980> in Thy truth.<WH571>
I do not sit<WH3427> with deceitful<WH7723> men,<WH4962> Nor<WH3808> will I go<WH935> with pretenders.<WH5956>
I hate<WH8130> the assembly<WH6951> of evildoers,<WH7489> And I will not sit<WH3427> with the wicked.<WH7563>
I shall wash<WH7364> my hands<WH3709> in innocence,<WH5356> And I will go<WH5437> about<WH5437> Thine altar,<WH4196> O Lord,<WH3068>
That I may proclaim<WH8085> with the voice<WH6963> of thanksgiving,<WH8426> And declare<WH5608> all<WH3605> Thy wonders.<WH6381>
O Lord,<WH3068> I love<WH157> the habitation<WH4583> of Thy house,<WH1004> And the place<WH4725> where<WH4908> Thy glory<WH9202> dwells.<WH4908>
Do not take<WH622> my soul<WH5315> away<WH622> [along] with sinners,<WH2400> Nor<WH408> my life<WH9132> with men<WH376> of bloodshed,<WH1818>
In whose<WH834> hands<WH3027> is a wicked<WH2154> scheme,<WH2154> And whose right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of bribes.<WH7810>
But as for me, I shall walk<WH1980> in my integrity;<WH8537> Redeem<WH6299> me, and be gracious<WH2603> to me.
My foot<WH7272> stands<WH5975> on a level<WH4334> place;<WH4334> In the congregations<WH4721> I shall bless<WH1288> the Lord.<WH3068>
